channel.title: Homes on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on devopstales

item.title: Install Squid proxy
item.description: Squid is the most popular Proxy server for Linux systems. The squid proxy server is also useful for the web packet filtering.

Azure DevOps Azure Pipelines Azure DevOps Microsoft’s Cloud based software development life cycle management platform. This platform offers solution for all the management of a development team. A typical development team is consists of software developmers, testers, DevOps engineers, and architects. Azure DevOps provides the fallowing components for your development team: Azure Bords for ticket management Azure Repositories for source code version control Azure Pipeline for continuous integration Azure Testing for test authorization Azure Artifact for artifact storage To use Azure DevOps first, you need to sign up at https://dev.

yaml # /etc/kubernetes/manifests/nginx.yaml --- apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: name: nginx spec: containers: - name: nginx image: nginx:1.14.2 ports: - containerPort: 80 Install containerd Install kubelet sudo curl -fsSLo /usr/share/keyrings/kubernetes-archive-keyring.gpg https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/kubernetes-archive-keyring.gpg] https://apt.kubernetes.io/ kubernetes-xenial main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list apt update apt install -y kubelet=1.23*
